user.name: Jeffrey Towson 陶迅
user.description: Consultant and speaker on how GenAI-powered customer experiences (CX) supercharge growth. Digital strategist. Get our free email and Tech Strategy podcast.

fullText:
SORRY, A16Z: THE US HAS ALREADY LOST THE ROBOTICS RACE TO CHINA

@a16z recently posted about how China is way ahead in robotics. 

And that the US must catch them.
